section.p: This class is used to capture comments about an Activity which might be made by various practitioners during the course of that Activity.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the comment.

Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
This property contains the comment text.

Contains exactly one [1..1] commentCategory with data type Code
A categorization of the comment, which might be used to locate specific comments or for display purposes.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTime with data type Point In Time
The date and time the comment was entered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Individual Provider
Indicates the practitioner who created the comment.
